mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, user_idx, post_category_idx) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userIdx}, #{postCategoryIdx})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where idx = #{idx}
update board set view_count = view_count + 1 where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT u.name, b.idx, b.title, b.write_date, b.view_count, b.content, b.post_category_idx, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment where board_idx = b.idx) AS recnt from user u, board b where u.idx = b.user_idx and b.post_category_idx = #{postCategoryIdx} and ${searchType} like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by b.idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(b.idx) from user u, board b where u.idx = b.user_idx and b.post_category_idx = #{postCategoryIdx} and ${searchType} like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into file_list(full_name, board_idx) values (#{fullName}, LAST_INSERT_ID())
